query:
UPDATE trip_positions t
SET
    trip_cumulative_haul_weight = q.trip_cumulative_haul_weight
FROM (
    SELECT
        *
    FROM
        UNNEST (
            $1::INT[],$2::TIMESTAMPTZ[],$3::INT[],$4::DOUBLE PRECISION[]
        ) u (trip_id,timestamp,position_type_id,trip_cumulative_haul_weight)
) q
WHERE
    t.trip_id = q.trip_id AND t.timestamp = q.timestamp AND t.position_type_id = q.position_type_id
